name: Momma's Gonna Hit Ya With a Shoe
name_original: Momma's Gonna Hit Ya With a Shoe
description:
Controls:

Z - Left Stack
X - Middle Stack
C - Right Stack
Alt - Reverse
Space - Submit/Enter

Esc - Self Destruct

* Make matches quickly to keep Mom at bay.
* If your fast enough, you'll gain XP.
* Mom keeps getting faster. Level up to slow her back down.
* Don't press the wrong button or She'll get angry...

This is only her base form. She will only get stronger. 

It will only get harder. 

The fun times come to an end.

Let us rejoice...
